This class allows placing and retrieving data from the clipboard

FlushingStream

A FileStream which always flushes to disk on disposal.

A GameHost which doesn't require a graphical or sound device.

NativeMemoryTracker

Track native memory allocations via GlobalStatistics. Also adds memory pressure automatically.

NativeMemoryTracker.NativeMemoryLease

A leased on a native memory allocation. Should be disposed when the associated memory is freed.

NativeStorage
SDLGameHost
Storage
TcpIpcProvider

An inter-process communication provider that runs over a specified TCP port, binding to the loopback address. This single class handles both binding as a server, or messaging another bound instance that is acting as a server.

ThreadRunner

Runs a game host in a specific threading mode.

DisplayMode

Represents a display mode on a given Display.

Represents Metal-specific graphics API provided by an IWindow.

Represents OpenGL-specific graphics API provided by an IWindow.

IWindow

Interface representation of the game window, intended to hide any implementation-specific code.

Enums

CursorState

Describes our supported states of the OS cursor.

ExecutionMode
ExecutionState

The game's execution states. All of these states can only be present once per GameHost. Note: The order of values in this enum matters.

GraphicsSurfaceType

The graphics surface of an IWindow.

WindowState

Enumerates the available window states in the operating system.

Delegates

Fired when text is edited, usually via IME composition.
